title: We Know The Way
lyrics:
[intro] (A)
(A) Tatou o tagata folau e vala’auina
(A) E le atua o le sami tele e o mai
(D) Ia ava’e le lu’itau e le(-E7)lei
Tapenape(A)na (olo olo maka)
 
(D) Aue, aue, (A)nuku i mua
(E7) Te manulele e ta(A)taki e
(D) Aue, aue, (A)te fenua, te malie
(E7) Nae ko hakilia (E7)mo kaiga e
 
(A) We read the wind and the sky when the sun is high
(A) We sail the length of the seas on the ocean breeze
(D) At night we name every star, (-E7) we know where we are
(A) We know who we are, who we are
 
(D) Aue, aue, (A) we set a course to find
(E7) A brand new island every(A)where we row
(D) Aue, aue, we (A)keep our island in our mind
(E7) And when it’s time to find home, (E7) we know the way
 
(D) Aue, aue, we are ex(A)plorers reading every sign
(A) We tell the stories of our (E7)elders in the never ending chain
 
(D) Aue, aue, (A)te fenua, te malie
(E7) Na heko hakilia, (E7) we know the wa(E7)aaay (A) [end]
